name: Tech Brag Document Notion Template
description: This Notion template for Brag Documents is a key tool to elevate your career. It makes keeping track of your achievements and contributions at work incredibly easy.It has been tailor-built for technical roles and has been contributed to by numerous engineering managers, software engineers and hiring managers.This is the advanced version with 3 interlinked databases. A simplified version will be coming soon but the template can be personalised to use the databases you wish to use.What's included?
features: A goals/projects database.; A weekly entries database which links to the goals/projects database.; A single entries database which links to the goals/projects database.; Pre-populated templates for every database - tailored to tech.; Comprehensive guides on using the brag doc template.; Resources for brag documents.; Prompts for brag doc entries.
